overview: An intimate portrait of one of the greatest guitarists in the history of rock. Join us on a journey into the world of Steve Howe as Steve explains his relationship with the guitar and how he helped to shape the extraordinary sound of Yes, Asia and GTR.  Featuring rare performance footage, extensive interviews and unique film of Steve at home and at work in the studio. This is an indispensable guide for lovers of great guitar playing.... and great rock music.
title: Steve Howe
